content: New mobile app release, v30.0.261! Details here: https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/1-announce/topic/mobile.20releases/near/2217685
Sorry for the humblebrag, but I also made a pull request for this release — it’s the one that turns the "TOPIC" button in the top-right corner into an icon button.

New app feels much more responsive!

In WhatsApp you can long-hold-click an emoji to see who reacted with that emoji. Could a similar thing be done for the zulip app?
That feature is already in the release notes for the latest app version.
